functions.name: getUserPref
functions.description: Gets a user value from the legacy pref system.

functions.name: getPref
functions.description: Gets a value from the legacy pref system.

parameters.name: aFallback
parameters.description: Value to be returned, if the requested preference does not exist.

functions.name: clearUserPref
functions.description: Removes a user value from the legacy pref system.
